name: emi.gfal-lcg_util
description:
GFAL (Grid File Access Library ) is a C library providing an abstraction layer of the grid storage system complexity.

The version 2.0 of GFAL tries to simplify at the maximum the file operations in a distributed environment.

the complexity of the grid is hidden from the client side behind a simple common POSIX API.

GFAL 2.0 is able to manage all the common used file access protocols in a grid environment  Dcap GSIDCAP, LFN RFIO (  DPM or CASTOR )  SRM,  GridFTP,  HTTP/WebDav .
releaseNotes:
The new version of GFAL/lcg_Utils provides:

the possibility to enable IPV6 in gfal 2.0 grisftp plugin by the config file

implementation of the mkdir recursive logic for gsiftp *lfc_plugin able to handle url with the form lfc://hostname/path instead of lfn:/path.

and fixes important issues like: *STORM Spacetoken does not seems to have lifetime and triggers an error with GFAL 2.0 transfers *change the default timeout of 180 secondes for lcg-util *gfal2 ssl thread safety
